page.title: 07Millbrook Area
page.content: The results of our survey in the area showed that many people were concerned about the standard of life in their area. There were problems caused by vandals, and graffiti written on walls and in subways. Noise was another problem, many people complained about it at night as the container berth at the docks started work. Fouling of pavements by dogs and litter were also a problem. Speeding cars and the use of roads by learner drivers also caused problems, especially as there are a large number of old age pensioners and old peoples homes in the area.
